page.title: 03FARMING AROUND TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: THIS IS A{HILL FARMING AREA,}LARGELY TENANTED, WITH THE REARING OF SHEEP &} BEEF CATTLE BEING THE MAIN CONCERN. {BLACKFACE}&{SOUTH COUNTRY CHEVIOT}ARE THE TYPES OF{SHEEP}BRED.{GALLOWAY}& {BLUE-GREY CATTLE}ARE REARED,SOME BEING CROSSED WITH A{SIMMENTAL}BULL.THE FARMERS SELL THEIR STOCK IN HAWICK, ANNAN & LONGTOWN. {GRASS}IS GROWN FOR {SILAGE}&, WEATHER PERMITTING,{HAY}MAKING ON THE HAUGHS & LOWER SLOPES.{STRAW}IS BOUGHT IN FOR BEDDING & FEEDING.{RAPE}IS GROWN TO FATTEN LAMBS ON. PASTURES ARE IMPROVED (ie DRAINED & RESEEDED) IN ORDER TO INCREASE STOCK NUMBERS, BOTH EWES & THE NUMBER OF TWIN LAMBS. GRANTS FROM THE DEPT. OF AGRICULTURE & THE EEC CERTAINLY HELP THE FARMERS IN THIS COSTLY VENTURE, BUT RENT REVIEWS EVERY 3 YEARS FORCES FARMERS TO SEEK WAYS OF UPPING THEIR INCOME TO COVER RENT ETC.
